value.title: What is Power BI Shared Datasets? How to user to develop Multiple Reports using Single Dataset?
value.excerpt: This vLog, represent the information about Power BI Shared Datasets. First, we will be discussing, What is Shared Datasets, how we can develop the reports using data from the Shared Datasets and how the permission model for the Power BI Shared Datasets work.
